title: Cocaine Kingpins: 'El Chapo' Edition
description: The late 1970's and early 80's saw the rise of the 'Cocaine Kingpin'. Many criminal figures sought their worldly riches through the distribution of Cocaine. While many were successful, others found death and misery. This book covers a handful of the most notorious bosses of the Cocaine underworld all the way up until the early 2,000's. Their meteoric and methodical ascensions to the top of the world and ultimate incarcerations and assassinations, are all covered inside! The story of the infamous Mexican drug lord, Joaquin 'El Chapo' Guzman, is also included in this updated version.
author: Sybil Jensen
